g.text: data model for license usage management based on ODRL
Supplier -- totally schematic - only the concepts
BSS -- totally schematic - only the concepts
AM (Asset Manager) purchases RTU from supplier
AUA (asset-usage-agreement/entitlement = list of permissions/Rights To Use)
purchaseOrder=assetUsageAgreement for multiple rights to use of the software
generate the asset-tags per RTU rules
contains all settings per softwareManagementSystem like Acumos
creator TEXT, modifier TEXT -- creator, modifier userId
PK -- identifier of the software up to specific version - revisionId in Acumos
GUID -- versionless product-id - solutionId in Acumos
TEXT IDX -- supplier or owner of the software
swCategory TEXT -- image processing, software, image, video, data, ...
swCatalogs JSONB -- array of catalog info the software is stored in Acumos
swCreators TEXT[] -- collection of userId values of the creators for swidTag = superusers of the software
matching software to target on permission/right-to-use
swProductName TEXT -- product name like Windows
> edition TEXT -- like Pro, Dev, Enterprise, Ultimate
> revision TEXT -- build or revision number
> marketVersion TEXT -- might differ from swVersion
> patch BOOL -- indication that this is a patch
> productUrl TEXT -- url to find more info at the licensor site
INTEGER -- 1,2,3,... revision of the swidTag - updates are allowed - auto-incremented by LUM
swidTagActive BOOL -- whether swidTag is not revoked-closed
creator TEXT, modifier TEXT, closer TEXT -- creator, modifier, closer userId
closureReason TEXT -- reason for the closure - revoked, expired, etc.
terms and conditions define the rights for managing the usage of the software asset
PK - identifier of the license - can be shared between multiple swTagId
TEXT IDX -- supplier or owner of the software
licenseProfile JSONB -- full body of the license profile
BOOL -- whether requires the right-to-use for usage, when false goes directly to usageMetrics
licenseTxt TEXT -- license.txt - humanly readable terms and conditions for the licenseProfile
licenseName TEXT -- name of the license in free text
licenseDescription TEXT -- desciption of the license in free text
INTEGER -- 1,2,3,... revision of the license - updates are allowed - auto-incremented by LUM
licenseProfileActive BOOL -- whether the license profile is currently active - not closed and not expired and not revoked
creator TEXT, modifier TEXT, closer TEXT -- creator, modifier, closer userId
closureReason TEXT -- reason for the closure - revoked, expired, etc.
related to ISO/IEC 19770-3: software entitlement (ENT) - collection of purchased rights-to-use
PK1 -- supplier or owner of the software
PK2 -- UID key to assetUsageAgreement in IRI or URI format
-- full body of ODRL agreement received from supplier
-- full body of ODRL agreement restriction from the subscriber company
-- groomed full body of ODRL agreement with restriction already applied
assetUsageAgreementActive BOOL -- whether agreement is enabled, but not revoked-closed or expired
creator TEXT, modifier TEXT, closer TEXT -- creator, modifier, closer userId
closureReason TEXT -- reason for the closure - revoked, expired, etc.
in ODRL this is a permission rule for matching and usage rights for specific software assets
TEXT UIDX1-1 -- supplier or owner of the software
TEXT[] -- list of action values for the rule (permission.action)
JSONB -- groomed target refinement with restriction already applied
JSONB -- groomed assignee refinement with restriction already applied
JSONB -- groomed usageConstraints with restriction already applied
consumedConstraints JSONB -- constraints that were consumed by grooming - for debugging
entitlement keys from supplier and are consumed by the software to unlock the functionality
isPerpetual BOOL -- never expires if true
goodFor INTERVAL -- timeperiod in seconds for entitled usage. Example: 30 days == 2592000 secs
JSONB {users: ['alex', 'justin']} -- metrics for assignee - list of unique users
usageStartReqId GUID -- identifier of request that started the usage of the rightToUse
usageStarted DATETIME -- populated on first start of the usage
INTEGER -- 1,2,3,... revision of the rightToUse - updates are allowed
INTEGER -- 1,2,3,... auto-incremented by LUM - revision of changing the value of the metrics
rightToUseActive BOOL -- whether rightToUse is enabled and not revoked-closed or expired
creator TEXT, modifier TEXT, closer TEXT -- creator, modifier, closer userId
closureReason TEXT -- reason for the closure - revoked, expired, etc.
metricsModifierReqId GUID -- identifier of request that modified the metrics
metricsModified DATETIME -- when the metrics was updated
request for granting the entitlement for the asset usage or record the event
can be more than one asset when other assets are included
GUID PK -- identifier of request that inserted the assetUsageHistory
requestHttp JSON: -- http method+urlPath part of the request
> path TEXT -- path in url like "/asset-usage/{assetUsageId}"
> ips TEXT[] -- ip-addresses of the http client, ...}
JSON -- see API for more details
INTEGER -- 200 for success, 224 for revoked, 402 for denial
JSON -- see API for more details
usageEntitled BOOL -- whether the action on the request has been entitled (true) or not (false) by LUM
usage entitlement result full copy of response message
userId TEXT -- userId on the request
requestDone BOOL -- true on sending the response
responseSent DATETIME -- when the response was sent
usage per single RTU+action on each asset separately.
contains constraints with status-metrics onRule and onRuleStandalone.
PK3 -- how the usageMetrics is created
PK -- identifier of the software up to specific version - revisionId in Acumos
FK to rightToUse -- identifier of the rightToUse for usageType=rightToUse
metrics JSONB -- metrics - count of action calls etc. {count:3, users:['alex', 'justin']}
creator TEXT, modifier TEXT -- creator, modifier userId
creatorRequestId GUID -- identifier of request that created the metrics
modifierRequestId GUID -- identifier of request that modified the metrics
usage of the software asset by users
FK2 to tail record on assetUsageHistory
FK2 to assetUsageHistory for last successful entitlement in assetUsageHistory
FK2 to assetUsageHistory for last entitlement
FK2 to assetUsageHistory for last event
creator TEXT, modifier TEXT -- creator, modifier userId
when software piece is either copied-included or composed of other software pieces
creatorRequestId GUID -- identifier of request that created the record
PK1 -- supplier or owner of the software
PK3 -- PK to the source table like swTagId
PK4 -- revision field on the source table like swidTagRevision
snapshotBody JSON -- copy of the full record from source table
requestId GUID -- uuid of the request that recorded the snapshot
txStep TEXT -- transaction step that recorded the snapshot
history of the usage of the software asset - can only insert - never update or delete to this table
FK2 to usageMetrics -- download, deploy, execute, ...
TEXT IDX -- supplier or owner of the software
TEXT -- system instance id that manages the software pieces and sent the request - like "Acumos#22"
TEXT -- component inside the system that sent the request like "model-runner"
INTEGER -- 1,2,3,... revision of the swidTag - updates are allowed - auto-incremented by LUM
INTEGER -- 1,2,3,... revision of the license - updates are allowed - auto-incremented by LUM
BOOL -- whether requires the right-to-use for usage
FK to rightToUse -- identifier of the rightToUse for usageType=rightToUse
JSONB -- usage metrics used for entitlement
isUsedBySwCreator BOOL -- whether the userId listed in swCreators of the software
assetUsageDenialSummary TEXT -- human readable summary for denial of the asset-usage
assetUsageDenial JSON[] -- denials of the usage of the software asset - see API
